publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2517 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs-That the Parliament agrees that The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No. 13) (Scotland) Order 2001, (SSI 2001/425) be approved. Supported by: Euan Robson*
